website_summaries.verdict: Classy look in a women's watch at a price point you don't see all that often.
pros: Hour and numerical markings on the watch face will remind you of a vintage clock
This watch stands out for its second hand, which few fashion watches offer
Almost an industrial look with the tiny gold screws used to attach the watch face to the stylish leather band
cons: Doesn't necessarily look like the watch and band go together

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much. If you have a petite wrist it is the perfect fit. I personally do not like any watches with a face over 30mm. This one is just right. The band is more of an off white color or a very light light blush, but it is still beautiful. Here are some photos in natural and room lighting.
customer_reviews.author: nancywonderland

customer_reviews.title: Goooood
customer_reviews.text: Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect Perfect perfect.
customer_reviews.author: beomjukim

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for as long as it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, perfect watch. The leather does wear out pretty quicy and the time started going wacko, I think because the battery was dying, but I loved every minute I used it. (Daily usage for a few months). (Wore it on the first date with my husband, where we unexpectedly went hiking to and around a waterfall and he was impressed I wear such practical yet classy looking jewelry (it was all water resistant))
customer_reviews.author: Kay Bd

customer_reviews.title: Cute petite watch
customer_reviews.text: Go well with my small wrist as mine wrist width is around 4cm. But for those with bigger wrist, you can have a look at attached photo and consider yourself :-)
customer_reviews.author: PDung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not for every day use!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous, however I have only had it for a month and the band is already discolored and is beginning to deteriorate. This is despite the fact that I always take it off before going to bed, when I shower, wash hands or dishes, etc. Don't buy this watch if you plan to wear it daily! However if it is for special occasions only, you will be very happy... It is (was) beautiful...
customer_reviews.author: mcm85

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks, Not So Good Time-Keeping
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this wrist watch and I love the looks of it. It has never kept very good time, though. It will go for a few days and be right on the button, then all of a sudden, for no discernable reason, it starts losing time. It is hard to rely on for appointments, etc. I've had the watch since 11/2017 and the leather band has split at the point where I hook the watch. If I could rely on the time being accurate I would buy this watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Tootie1947

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty watch; great size for smaller wrists.
customer_reviews.text: I love this series of Anne Klein small leather watches. My wrist is 6.5" around, and most things look clunky. Not these. Perfect size. The rose gold is on trend. Other reviewers are correct that the band is a VERY subtle pink, closer to beige. This is exactly what I wanted but others may be seeking a straighter pink. It is a matte finish and will absorb other dyes. In my case, it was stained by a black leather bracelet. Not the watch's fault but I am pointing it out to save others from the heartbreak.
customer_reviews.author: BuffaloBillie

customer_reviews.title: This watch arrived already running and lasted maybe 1 month ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch arrived already running and lasted maybe 1 month before it stopped working. This is the second Anne Klein watch I've ordered from Amazon. The first one lasted almost a year. I took it a few places to get the battery replaced, but no one could get the back off. We'll see if I'm able to get this one replaced. I won't be ordering any more watches.
customer_reviews.author: TXgrammy

customer_reviews.title: Good for small wrists!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a watch that has a small face and this is perfect for my tiny wrists at 26mm! My only problem, nothing major, is that the band could use another whole or two. When I put it on the smallest one the watch is a bit loose but not so much that it spins around my wrist. Overall I like the size, style, color and price! This color looks like a very light peach/cream and could be worn for an everyday watch or for dressier outfits. This is a nice, simple and elegant watch and I would definitely recommend it for a ‘petite’ wrist - it would look lost on a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: E. R.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and practical
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very attractive and easy to read. No need to punch another hole in the band as it has a sufficient amount. All that being said, I have just begun wearing it so I have not come across the flaws (if any) yet. I believe it is also waterproof which is important. I guess I should really wait until I've worn it a few months before writing a review but as of now, these are my thoughts. So far, not disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, not really pink
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-looking watch that I'm looking forward to wearing. Note the band is more beige than pink; if you need a real pink, AK has some better selections.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon in Silver Spring

customer_reviews.title: No a qualified watch
customer_reviews.text: Simple but elegant style. The brown color is easy to match any style. Good quality at a low price. The size is perfect for me, not too big. Love it. I am back to revise my review after months. It goes half an hour slow in 24 hours. Definitely not meeting the basic requirement of a clock. I do not believe it a a battery issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy lady

customer_reviews.title: Like the water but don't like the watch is running when unboxed
customer_reviews.text: The watch is smaller than I wanted and the leather strap is also narrower than expected. Other than that I like the red strap and silver tone. It is not too small. Silver on white dial makes it easy to read. What I do like about it is the watch is running upon receipt. Who knows how long this watch has been in box since manufacturing and how much longer the battery will last. There is a chance the battery dies in a month. I'll not be very happy if that happens. I'll update when the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: CautiousShopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the rose colored watch and I love the color. I don't have a petite wrist but the watch is a perfect fit. It's not too large but also not so small that it looks disproportionate on my wrist. The face is easy to read and the band is soft and comfortable to wear. I compliment the watch with a small beaded rose color chain bracelet. One of my most favorite watches I've owned
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Functional (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: Original Review: I work at a daycare during the summer where I am constantly needing to keep track of time. This is functional and it doesnt matter if I get it wet when I wash my hands. It is also a very beautiful piece! I also love the size of the face! Update: I have worn this watch a total of three times and the leather strap is already showing the top layer peeling away. It’s hard to see, but I still think it is a sign of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it, however I don't. The face on this watch has a small face. I am already returning one because it came with no battery. This watch is more beige than rose and the face is small. They have the exact same watch with a bigger face that I could have brought if they would have specified the differences.
customer_reviews.author: Ms V

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, both the band and the face, for a medium-sized wrist -- classic, adorable, functional. I just bought another in red! Hope they last forever!
customer_reviews.author: BofHope

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep time
customer_reviews.text: I think this watch looks really nice but it doesn't keep time well. I actually sent the first one I bought back for this reason and Amazon sent me a replacement. The replacement has the same issues as the first one. I would not recommend this watch if you actually need it to tell time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable, and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this item; it works well, and even looks nice. It looks larger in the photo, as if the band is wider and the silver accented links look larger than it really is also. It is more petit and feminine than it looks in this picture. So many of you who don't like the representation in this picture may like the actual product. Otherwise, it keeps good time, has a well made band and face, and is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Autumnite

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty watch but the face is plastic
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one as a gift; it was so pretty I ordered one for myself. It arrived with a dark smudge/scratch on the inside of the watch face cover so I returned it. When replacement arrived, the face cover had a scratch on it- it is plastic, not glass, so beware. Had to send it back for a refund. If you don't mind an easily scratchable surface, then this watch design is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I received this beautiful watch for an anniversary gift. It is a great size and comfortable to wear. After about 2 weeks of wear the face of the watch popped out. I didn’t even realize happened until one of the clock hands got snagged on my shirt so now I can’t even repair it. I was so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Want a working watch?  This isn't it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch to replace the Fossil watch that I ordered from Amazon but didn't work. This watch arrived in working order. Very nice looking but I've had to change the time on it 5 times now. It just stops and starts moving again when I change the time. From here on out, I'll buy my watches at a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: lynn beasley

customer_reviews.title: very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother who needed a new watch without having to squint her eyes to read it! Beautiful design, sleek & sharp with large numbers on face. Perfect for my mother! I chose the red band to match her red purse. Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.author: glory-B

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is as pretty as the picture shows. I have worn it daily for several weeks now and love the size of the face. It's easy to read, but not so big that it isn't feminine. The only disappointment is that the edge of the buckle gouged out a piece of the strap the first week I wore it. Fortunately it is covered by the buckle and doesn't show.
customer_reviews.author: Bogey’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch and would buy it again. It doesn't have a date but I don't need that and there are other watches which do have the date if that is your thing. I love the size of the face of the watch...not too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Martha LaMarche

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought a second
customer_reviews.text: In this digital world I like to have some analog in my life and this watch fits perfectly in every way. Just the right size. Easy to read. Keeps time. Stylish so it effortlessly goes from workday to evening outing.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, which I love to wear. Unfortunately it stops, a lot. I've taken it in to have the battery changed half a dozen times, only to be told it "just stopped" and the battery was fine. A little adjustment from the jeweler, or sometimes just a rewind, will make it start again. But you never know when it's going to stop. Also be aware, the band is designed for a pretty large wrist. I had to have two more buckle holes put in to make it fit, and it nearly goes around my wrist twice.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Elis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design for women! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful design watch. Pretty cute on my wrist, I love it. The design looks aesthetical. Shipping was promptly good speed, very secured shipping. I am using it finely at my work. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Jackpot!
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult buying a watch without trying it on. SURPRISE! I took a chance and hit the jackpot. The fit and the look is just right for me. I like my new watch.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Band is irregular size
customer_reviews.text: The watch face is quite nice. I had to return 2 of these watches because the holes are in a strange alignment on band so did not fit my small wrist. Usually I can just use last or second to last hole.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Is Fun

customer_reviews.title: Very fine watch
customer_reviews.text: Picture does not help this item. When received it looks like a fine piece of jewelry. Very detailed and awesome. It was a gift and the person loved it. Recomend it. Looks way better than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jafet

customer_reviews.title: Battery was not protected.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the watch; however, it arrived ticking and the time was not set accurately. I have no idea what to expect for the life of the battery! I expected there to be a tab in place to maintain battery life prior to it's ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Milstein

customer_reviews.title: Small and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch. The face is smaller than how to picture shows. Really just 1 inch and that includes the metal framing. All that aside it is really a nice looking watch just use your readers to see the time.
customer_reviews.author: Christacap

customer_reviews.title: Appearance
customer_reviews.text: I really liked and loved this watch. I can't definitely write comment about water resistance quality of this watch whereas I'm just wearing it and need more time to get sure of its quality. But I really liked its appearance and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Arzu

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I couldn't judge the size of the face too well before ordering and thought it might be larger but it's the perfect small-ish size. I just got it a few days ago so we'll see how well and long the band holds up (fabric bands don't hold up as well as metal in my experience). But so far I am really happy I ordered it as a gift for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: bagnyc

customer_reviews.title: unusual/unique leather watch band broke
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch but can not wear it as the leather band broke and there doesn't seem to be a replacement band available? Would really like to have access to a new band...
customer_reviews.author: Cee Heff

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch, I wasn't aware that it is water resistant until I swam in a pool for about an hour with it on. the strap is still perfect and it keeps perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: jinmaine

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. It's big enough to be easily readable and stand out, but small enough that it fits on a thinner wrist and doesn't feel huge or ungainly. Easy dials to turn for setting the time. Band has held up 6 months now (and I've accidentally worn it in the shower a few times).
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo. I have owned many Anne Klein watches. I have enjoyed all of them and have found them to be durable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and elegant watch; just as depicted. I wanted a watch for more formal gatherings and I am glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: E M

customer_reviews.title: This watch is very simple but beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very simple but beautiful! I believe my step mom will really like it. The only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 Stars is because it was already ticking when it arrived. If it were for me I wouldn't worry, but I am concerned how long the battery will last as I don't know how long it's been on for.
customer_reviews.author: sylvera

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch
customer_reviews.text: Pretty watch. I didn't want a big face on it and this one is a nice size. Can tell time on it easily. The end of the band curls up after it passes the loop which isn't appealing. I am wearing it and am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this watch!!! It’s tiny. Nothing like I saw in the description posted. Even my 18 year old daughter doesn’t want it. Looks cheap and cheesy. Thanks for nothing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin & Timesha Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Anne Klein watch in black....looks expensive....have received many compliments....This is the second one I've ordered....keeps excellent time!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: it is a pretty watch. I haven't had it long enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear shopping and so forth, it is a pretty watch. I haven't had it long enough to know how it will last. The reason 4 stars is the band is not the greatest leather, but for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: jlw

customer_reviews.title: Very classy and pretty- great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch because it’s so simple and classic. I gave this to my mom for Christmas and she loved it! I love it because it’s simple and elegant and can go with anything casual or dressy! Its beautiful and well built!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Houser

customer_reviews.title: What my daughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a new watch for work with numbers. All I could find were really ugly ones. This one has a pretty face and even though it didn't have all the numbers she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Girl

customer_reviews.title: color is a little off
customer_reviews.text: I got the red/silver watch and I like it very much, but the band is a softer red than pictured; more like the inside of a tomato than a bright red. Definitely not as bright as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Cerys

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. It is a pretty and feminine watch. Easy to read and to wear. The band is a bit inflexible and may easily break, but overall I enjoy the watch very much.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received this watch in white.... liked it so much I order it in brown. They turned out to be different sizes. Still like the watch just be careful if this is too small for your own personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a birthday present. She is petite and love small watches since her wrist is thin. Very nice looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love Ann Klein watch’s
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my wife, she loves it very much! She had a older Ann Klein from a cruise we took years back ! Very happy with the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully Amazon made it easy to return
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back. The picture to me is a bit deceptive it is a normal sized faced watch. Not the larger face that is the style today. Maybe I missed something in the description. Thankfully Amazon made it easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: kanread

customer_reviews.title: Affordab
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars except for the strap needs extra holes. I have a very small wrist and k. The tightest hole the watch spins around causing the face to get scratched
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Steed

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Watch works well for my GF, the only bad thing is she's still late for any apts she has. Its her second one of this exact watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of item is great
customer_reviews.text: Easy comfy fit with a quality leather. I like to see the time without needing eyewear! I love the red band and overall quality is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Books & Coffee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch, lovely rose gold metal
customer_reviews.text: beautiful watch, lovely rose gold metal, very tasteful and coordinates well with any outfit, but battery died within a week. leather starting to show wrinkles and wear after only a week as well, but still a beautiful watch - hopefully once i take it to replace battery at jeweler, it won't die again so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch...good value
customer_reviews.text: Its really pretty, but I have a hard time seeing the dial in certain light, because it blends into the background. I also miss having a nite light on it that you can press to see in the dark. I'll buy one again, but a different dial color. Good value on a stylish watch.
customer_reviews.author: wendie

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch so much, the color is nice and complement almost any outfit i put on. I have to punch two holes in the watch to fit my wrist but i have a small wrist. Even after about three months it still work great, and the leather does get a bit worn out underneath but i don't mind considering i wear it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: TTranhhs

customer_reviews.title: Tiny face
customer_reviews.text: The watch is good quality with a nice strap and face but the picture is practically true to size, the watch is very small in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looked like a cheap knockoff from China, it was intended as a gift but the watch looked too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: It is a good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: My problem with this watch is that it is so much smaller than it looks in the photo. It is a very nice watch but I wanted it to be bigger the photo is incredibly misleading
customer_reviews.author: Tin Tin

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an adult unless you like tiny watches
customer_reviews.text: This is just too small. Maybe for a kid about 10 years old. Nice for a gift for a child. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: KayR.

customer_reviews.title: JUST OK
customer_reviews.text: Watch band and face of the watch much small than what it appears. quality ok, but disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda T. Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Loved the style; both times it only worked for 3 days - bad battery?
customer_reviews.text: I love the style/size of this watch; it's exactly what I was looking for. I was disappointed that it only worked for 3 days after receiving it. I returned it for a 2nd watch, which worked only 2 days. Due to a busy work & travel schedule, i missed the window for returning this item, which was pretty narrow. I emailed Amazon asking if they would credit me the price of the replacement battery, becuase I'm fairly certain it is the battery that stopped working both times...no response. I love Amazon and am a loyal customer, but this was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TessaRose17

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks good. But it stopped working within a month of ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks good. But it stopped working within a month of the purchase. I guess the battery died. It's been lying around unworn since. Will have to take it to a watch shop to get it fixed. Would have just returned it, but I already punched an extra hole into the watch strap. Quite unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This is just the size I was looking for in a simple understated watch. My only complaint is that the red is lighter/brighter than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Obiero

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Watch
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch...it fits perfectly and is very stylish. It's petite and so easy to read. The red leather band makes a wonderful statement 😘
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Classy watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this watch since he knows I like Ann Klein and my previous watch was lost. Even though the band is red I can use it every day. I really love this classy watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Smile

customer_reviews.title: The classic style
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this watch and plan to use it as my everyday watch.The Armitron name and the reasonable price appealed to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great design but the actual watch is way smaller that whats viewd
customer_reviews.text: Great watch great design but the only issue is that this was a gift for my mom with vision problem and the image was way bigger than the actual watch. Too small for her.
customer_reviews.author: EGM

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the watch. Looks classy and easy to read. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is easy to read and I love the red band. It also keeps accurate time.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M.

customer_reviews.title: very nice elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: very happy to had received as a gift, love the elegance of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: L. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful watch I don't have to Charge!
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I was looking for.Beautiful! for my up coming trip. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DTison

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!  Rose gold doesn't jump out at you.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this watch daily for 4 months now. It looks great and I've had no problems wit it. Just loving it. I have other watches, but love this one too much to wear any of my other watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on small wrist.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have red leather for a change. Face is a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and somewhat delicate watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and somewhat delicate watch. I've had it for a few months and, and it is still ticking. I wear it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this watch for me as a Christmas gift. I like it a lot. I have a small wrist and the watch face does not look too large for my wrist. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marti G. Detrick

customer_reviews.title: It looks real nice.
customer_reviews.text: Will I don't know for sure? It is still setting under the tree waiting till Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is as pictured and has a classically simple look. I was looking for something with a narrow band and this fit my needs. It fits my wrist perfectly and works great with my work clothes. My only complaint is that the tiny screws will sometimes catch fibers from my sweater and I'll have to pull them off of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive ... but
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the watch, but the time is hard to read under certain light conditions and at night. Face does not light up. Also, it does not have a day/date function which might be desirable to some customers.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality watch.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stylish watch, and it's water resistant too. High quality, which is rare these days.
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This will be a Christmas gift.......so hopefully she will like this!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Looks beautiful on my small wrist. The colors of dial and strap are a pitch lighter in person than shown in the picture. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio11

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great. I got it wet and it’s still working
customer_reviews.author: Maryland

customer_reviews.title: It is a gift for my wife who has yet ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for my wife who has yet to see it but I thought it looked cheaper in the flesh than in the pics. I cannot comment on the reliability issues mentioned in reviews.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for someone and she loves it! It looks stylish and fits her wrist perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my sister in law.She really liked the watch.she eears small dial watch and Its a small dial watch ,in pics it looks bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: Annede

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really nice and it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Genesia T

customer_reviews.title: Best for regular use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: If you're a person who likes small and delicate jewelry, this is for you. Very elegant dial, can be worn with formals and dresses as well. Worth the money for sure. Not sure about water resistant, since I don't want to take any chance on that.
customer_reviews.author: Aastha Shah

customer_reviews.title: Lovely watch of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter who is a professor. She needed a quality watch with large numbers so she could glance at it while teaching instead of checking her phone. The rose gold color is lovely and the numbers are large enough to see at a glance. Keeps good time. Not overly large like some of the current watches on the market. Feminine in size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: It fit like a little girl should be wearing. Very small. Returned
customer_reviews.author: sisnphx

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for a gift and the person loved it so much. Good quality for a nice price!
customer_reviews.author: Anny Delvaux

customer_reviews.title: The color is easy to match with outfit
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simple but keep your attract. The color is easy to match with outfit. It looks nice and cute in real. I bought one before as a gift with great discount price . I wish to buy more this watch again if they offer more discount again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find for the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed an everyday watch that would be easy to match with most of my wardrobe. The face is a bit smaller than I expected, but I have a small wrist so it works out fine.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have another Anne Klein watch that I like, so I ordered this when it was on sale. I like the watch and it is good quality, but is smaller than I would have liked, but that is not the sellers fault. I still kept the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q. N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch.
customer_reviews.text: Like the smart styling and band is long enough to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday watch, very light and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lakes

product_meta.title: Anne Klein Women's 10/9442 Leather Strap Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * This darling Anne Klein™ watch exudes a kind of class and beauty one never tires of seeing on their wrist.
 * Gold-tone metal case.
 * Brown leather band features an adjustable buckle closure.
 * Round face.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Champagne dial features gold-tone hour markers and hands, a black minute track, and Anne Klein detailing.
 * Water resistant 30 m/100ft.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 26 mm
    *  Case Width: 26 mm
    *  Case Depth: 8 mm
    *  Band Width: 12 7⁄10 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 8 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 1 oz
